title: Bengals Vs Rams Super Bowl, Championship Game Sunday Recap And Brady Retires?
description:
Championship Game Sunday has occurred. We start with fastest 2 minutes and then recap both games (00:02:43 - 00:05:06). Bengals going to the Super Bowl. Chiefs choke down the stretch ( 00:05:06- 00:46:40). Rams vs Niners and the curse of being Kyle Shanahan in the 4th quarter ((00:46:40 - 01:09:12). Tom Brady retires? Maybe? (01:09:12 - 01:25:49) Talking Soccer, Talking Tennis and Whoâ€™s back of the week (01:25:49 - 01:43:02)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
